title: Officials Debunk Viral Video: Leopard Attack on Train is AI-Generated Fake
description: The authorities of the SDTR have issued clarification saying that it is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) general fake video, created with an aim to spread panic in the area.
content:
Bhopal: A video showing a leopard chasing a running train and then dragging a passenger out of it has gone viral on social media, triggering panic in villages adjoining Sanjay Dubri Tiger Reserve (SDTR) in Madhya Pradesh’s Sidhi district.
The authori... [1017 chars]

title: US economy to ride tax cut tailwind but faces risks
description: A SEE-SAW year for the US economy in 2025 looks set to give way to a stronger 2026, thanks to tailwinds from President Donald Trump’s tax cuts, less uncertainty around tariffs, the ongoing artificial intelligence (AI) boom and a late-year run of interest-rate reductions from the Federal Reserve (Fed).

title: Meta buys artificial intelligence startup Manus
description: The Wall Street Journal reported that Meta closed the deal at more than $2 billion.
content:
DETROIT (AP) — Meta is buying artificial intelligence startup Manus, as the owner of Facebook and Instagram continues an aggressive push to amp up AI offerings across its platforms.

title: SoftBank in $4B AI deal to buy DigitalBridge
description: TOKYO — Japan’s SoftBank said it is buying US data center investor DigitalBridge in a deal worth around $4 billion, the latest acquisition in founder Masayoshi Son’s push to become a major player in artificial intelligence (AI).
content:

title: Meta to buy Chinese startup Manus to boost advanced AI
description: META said on Monday it would acquire Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) startup Manus as the technology giant accelerates efforts to integrate advanced AI across its platforms.
content:
META said on Monday it would acquire Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) startup Manus as the technology giant accelerates efforts to integrate advanced AI across its platforms.

title: Meta's AI Power Move: Acquires Singapore's Manus for Over $2 Billion
description: Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, has acquired artificial intelligence startup Manus in a deal reportedly worth over $2 billion. Manus, based in Singapore, offers general-purpose AI agents and has seen rapid growth. The acquisition is part of Meta's strategy to enhance its AI capabilities.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc., the tech giant behind Facebook and Instagram, has acquired the AI startup Manus, continuing its strategic expansion into artificial intelligence.

title: As a property slump drags on, China's economy looks more resilient than it feels
description: HONG KONG — By some measures, China’s economy is looking resilient, with strong exports and breakthroughs in artificial intelligence (AI) and other advanced technologies.
content:
